baramos.title: Baramos
baramos.description: Windproof king and wizard who wastes no time whipping out Kaboom, Kafrizz and all kinds of calamity-inducing conjury.
baramos.secondaryDescription: Takes great pleasure in obliterating people while they're busy poking fun at his bizarre appearance.

dhoulmagus.title: Dhoulmagus
dhoulmagus.description: Superfast attacker who likes to rush his foes off their feet, and whose Kacrack packs a kick. Not a fan of earth attacks.
dhoulmagus.secondaryDescription: Try not to be too annoyed by this self-satisfied clown laughing down his nose at you. Smack the smile off his smug old face!
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (10-40% drop from

dragonlord.title: Dragonlord
dragonlord.description: Lizard lord who ravages all with great gouts of flame, and whose fire-retardant scales stop any such scorching in return.
dragonlord.secondaryDescription: This proud and mighty beast rules over all the dragon clans of the world with a high and haughty hand.
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (2% drop from

estark.title: Estark
estark.description: Not only can he pound opponents with Kafrizzle and Kaboom, he packs a powerful punch as well. Good luck!
estark.secondaryDescription: This emperor of the underworld evolved into his horrific form after hibernating for many milennia.

malroth.title: Malroth
malroth.description: Brings about destruction by breathing both fire and ice, and disruption with Disruptive Wave. Hard to harm with darkness.
malroth.secondaryDescription: This deity of the damned enjoys nothing more than the sacrificed souls of his most sincere followers. Mmmmm!

mortamor.title: Mortamor
mortamor.description: Stares enemies into a slumber, then clobbers them with Kafrizz and Kafrizzle. Can be damaged with darkness.
mortamor.secondaryDescription: Assesses opponents' strength, then assumes a disguise to suit the situation. No one knows what he really looks like…

murdaw.title: Murdaw
murdaw.description: Casts Kasap to curb his enemies' enthusiasm, then curbs it further with Dazzleflash and Disruptive Wave.
murdaw.secondaryDescription: Gains a hold over people by plunging them into a world of nightmares from which they can't escape. Never sleeps himself.
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (10-40% drop from

nimzo.title: Nimzo
nimzo.description: Likes to kick in with Kaboom after taking the edge off his enemies by casting Bounce and Kasap.
nimzo.secondaryDescription: Some thought he could only command from afar, but he has more than enough mental and physical ability to rule the world.
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (10-40% drop from

nokturnus.title: Nokturnus
nokturnus.description: Improves his already eye-watering attack with Oomph, then smacks foes silly with a stupidly speedy assault.
nokturnus.secondaryDescription: Brutal bad-dream demon from another dimension. So strong that he makes Mortamor seem more like Snoretamore!

orgodemir.title: Orgodemir
orgodemir.description: Screams enemies into submission with a blood-curdling cry, then hits hard with Hellfire. Always attacks twice.
orgodemir.secondaryDescription: Doesn't like people to know that he's a dumpy dragon, so disguises himself as a dashing young dandy.

psaro.title: Psaro
psaro.description: Toughens up with Kabuff, then — Shazam! — hits hard with Kazam. Keep him under control with water-based warcraft.
psaro.secondaryDescription: A tragic figure who forsook his normal form to wreak revenge on the mortals who murdered his beloved.
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (10-40% drop from

rhapthorne.title: Rhapthorne
rhapthorne.description: Evil incantations and Kafrizz form just part of this portly demon's plan to exterminate his enemies. Lick him with light.
rhapthorne.secondaryDescription: Some say his body is so big that it contains enough cursed power to contort the space-time continuum itself.
whereToFind: Legacy boss grotto map (Reward for 179 Pants Macabre|quest 179)

tyrannosaurus-wrecks.title: Tyrannosaurus Wrecks
tyrannosaurus-wrecks.description: A supremely destructive demon who broke free from the book into which he was sealed by a supreme sage ages ago.
tyrannosaurus-wrecks.secondaryDescription: The wickedest of the Hackson Five. He wanted to destroy the world, but was stopped by a saintly sage.

zoma.title: Zoma
zoma.description: A truly intimidating opponent who can attack twice and use seriously strong spells. Lay into him with the power of light.
zoma.secondaryDescription: His unparalleled evil made him very popular with monsters, but he left the lands above to escape his screaming fans.
